## LookupByPath.deleteSubtree() method

> This API is provided as a beta preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

Deletes an item and all its children.

**Signature:**

```typescript
deleteSubtree(query: string, delimeter?: string): boolean;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

query


</td><td>

string


</td><td>

The path to the item to delete


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

delimeter


</td><td>

string


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ Optional override delimeter for parsing the query


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

boolean

`true` if any nodes were deleted, `false` otherwise
